page.description: Defines what List data (edits only or all data) should be persisted to Local Storage.

discussion.p: Specify if the entire List should be persisted after each edit or only List modifications. If data is persisted to LocalStorage, 'Full' is recommended. If data is persisted to the File System, this property is automatically set to 'Edits' and cannot be changed.

item.name: Edits
item.description: Only edited rows are persisted to Local Storage after each edit.

item.name: Full
item.description: The entire List is persisted to Local Storage after each edit.

important.p: This property only applies if the List is persisting data to Local Storage.
